name: BloxiTag
description:
BloxiTag is known as a GTAG fangame, where you can just roam around or hangout with players or users on servers.

(NOTE! This game is in Pre-Alpha. Potential bugs may cause in the game.)

(ANOTHER NOTE! You will need SteamVR for this game to work. I think so...)

GameJolt Version: BloxiTag by B0X0 - Game Jolt
